titles.title: America Cares Act

A bill to require the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish an America Cares Program to provide for the establishment of demonstration projects for the provision of vouchers and cash contributions for goods and services for homeless individuals, to provide technical assistance and public information, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8458-8459)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

action.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-209.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. America Cares Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish the America Cares Program to make grants for homeless assistance demonstration projects.
